macros: #define getVariantValue(var, member) std::visit([](auto bareElement) {return bareElement->member;}, var)
#define setVariantValue(var, member, value) std::visit([value](auto bareElement) {return bareElement->member = value;}, var)

members.Interface_Object_Type: enum class type {constant, variable, signal, file}
